org.magiclen.magicurlnetwork

Class MagicHEAD

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.magiclen.magicurlnetwork.MagicURLNetwork
      • org.magiclen.magicurlnetwork.MagicHEAD

  • public class MagicHEAD
extends MagicURLNetwork
    對URL發出HEAD需求(Request)，常用於取得標頭訊息。
    See Also:
    MagicURLNetwork, Body, NetworkListener
